text: <a href="../2-Corinthians-10-1/" title="2 Corinthians 10:1 KJV verse detail"><span id="3" class="versehover">1 Now I Paul myself beseech you by the meekness and gentleness of Christ, who in presence *am* base among you, but being absent am bold toward you:

<a href="../2-Corinthians-10-2/" title="2 Corinthians 10:2 KJV verse detail"><span id="4" class="versehover">2 But I beseech *you*, that I may not be bold when I am present with that confidence, wherewith I think to be bold against some, which think of us as if we walked according to the flesh.
<a href="../2-Corinthians-10-3/" title="2 Corinthians 10:3 KJV verse detail"><span id="5" class="versehover">3 For though we walk in the flesh, we do not war after the flesh:

<a href="../2-Corinthians-10-4/" title="2 Corinthians 10:4 KJV verse detail"><span id="6" class="versehover">4 (For the weapons of our warfare *are* not carnal, but mighty through God to the pulling down of strong holds;)

<a href="../2-Corinthians-10-5/" title="2 Corinthians 10:5 KJV verse detail"><span id="7" class="versehover">5 Casting down imaginations, and every high thing that exalteth itself against the knowledge of God, and bringing into captivity every thought to the obedience of Christ;
<a href="../2-Corinthians-10-6/" title="2 Corinthians 10:6 KJV verse detail"><span id="8" class="versehover">6 And having in a readiness to revenge all disobedience, when your obedience is fulfilled.

<a href="../2-Corinthians-10-7/" title="2 Corinthians 10:7 KJV verse detail"><span id="9" class="versehover">7 Do ye look on things after the outward appearance? If any man trust to himself that he is Christ's, let him of himself think this again, that, as he *is* Christ's, even so *are* we Christ's.

<a href="../2-Corinthians-10-8/" title="2 Corinthians 10:8 KJV verse detail"><span id="10" class="versehover">8 For though I should boast somewhat more of our authority, which the Lord hath given us for edification, and not for your destruction, I should not be ashamed:
<a href="../2-Corinthians-10-9/" title="2 Corinthians 10:9 KJV verse detail"><span id="11" class="versehover">9 That I may not seem as if I would terrify you by letters.

<a href="../2-Corinthians-10-10/" title="2 Corinthians 10:10 KJV verse detail"><span id="12" class="versehover">10 For *his* letters, say they, *are* weighty and powerful; but *his* bodily presence *is* weak, and *his* speech contemptible.

<a href="../2-Corinthians-10-11/" title="2 Corinthians 10:11 KJV verse detail"><span id="13" class="versehover">11 Let such an one think this, that, such as we are in word by letters when we are absent, such *will we be* also in deed when we are present.

<a href="../2-Corinthians-10-12/" title="2 Corinthians 10:12 KJV verse detail"><span id="14" class="versehover">12 For we dare not make ourselves of the number, or compare ourselves with some that commend themselves: but they measuring themselves by themselves, and comparing themselves among themselves, are not wise.

<a href="../2-Corinthians-10-13/" title="2 Corinthians 10:13 KJV verse detail"><span id="15" class="versehover">13 But we will not boast of things without *our* measure, but according to the measure of the rule which God hath distributed to us, a measure to reach even unto you.

<a href="../2-Corinthians-10-14/" title="2 Corinthians 10:14 KJV verse detail"><span id="16" class="versehover">14 For we stretch not ourselves beyond *our measure*, as though we reached not unto you: for we are come as far as to you also in *preaching* the gospel of Christ:

<a href="../2-Corinthians-10-15/" title="2 Corinthians 10:15 KJV verse detail"><span id="17" class="versehover">15 Not boasting of things without *our* measure, *that is*, of other men's labours; but having hope, when your faith is increased, that we shall be enlarged by you according to our rule abundantly,

<a href="../2-Corinthians-10-16/" title="2 Corinthians 10:16 KJV verse detail"><span id="18" class="versehover">16 To preach the gospel in the *regions* beyond you, *and* not to boast in another man's line of things made ready to our hand.
<a href="../2-Corinthians-10-17/" title="2 Corinthians 10:17 KJV verse detail"><span id="19" class="versehover">17 But he that glorieth, let him glory in the Lord.
<a href="../2-Corinthians-10-18/" title="2 Corinthians 10:18 KJV verse detail"><span id="20" class="versehover">18 For not he that commendeth himself is approved, but whom the Lord commendeth.
